de.hardcode.jxinput.keyboard
Class JXKeyboardInputDevice

java.lang.Object
  de.hardcode.jxinput.keyboard.JXKeyboardInputDevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
JXInputDevice
public class JXKeyboardInputDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements JXInputDevice

Virtual input device treating a AWT keyboard as a source for Buttons.
